title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: According to the recent tweets posted by WhaleStats on-chain data service, large Ethereum whales keep purchasing big chunks of Polygon’s native coin MATIC, while the coin has added more than 26 percent in the past two days and in total has gained roughly 70 percent since the start of the week. Whales grab 15 million MATIC on 70% price surgeWhaleStats has reported that over the past 24 hours, whale known as "BlueWhale0072" has made two transactions, acquiring 10,000,000 and 4,723,190 MATIC tokens. All-in-all, these two purchases were worth $8.7 million.As covered by U.Today earlier, whales have been actively acquiring MATIC over the past six weeks since early May. By doing so they have demonstrated a 9-percent rise of their balances of wallets holding from 100 million to 1 billion tokens. Details: https://u.today/15-million-matic-bought-by-eth-whale-as-token-rises-26-in-past-3-days

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: This is a good token with excellent liquidity on both centralized and decentralized exchanges. The 2nd level solution will be relevant for several years, until transactions in the mainnet become cheaper, and even after that, I don’t think that this ecosystem will lose popularity.

comments.author: CuriousGeorge
comments.body: It seems like that the whales have been starting to accumulate more and more tokens. It's not only matic but some defi tokens were also being hyped and i see that whales are also accumulating more and more shiba inu as well. Could this become a signal if the recovery will be happening very soon? I have bought matic during the dump and the whales were giving me huge profit and i personally think that if this will be growing even more from day to the another day.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Is this the time that I should buy it? I think it would be a great idea knowing that people will start buying it more and more. I believe that MATIC and the team behind it, Polygon, is aiming to be one of the cryptocurrency scene's best. So I think having this type of news would be great.

comments.author: koang
comments.body: Polygon has accomplished a lot this quarter, especially zkTech which offers next-generation scaling solutions but don't be deceived.We are still in a bear market and the market conditions are still the same.Don't throw in all your USD, Leave your DCA intact. IMHO

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: The holders of the token decides to hold the token then its fine but in my opinion if you're already in profits and a slight bump when the total market is completely down then I will sell it and wait for the red season again because I don't think we are in the near of bull trend so just an opportunity to make some money that's it.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Good to see that. That means if the bearish trend may get reverse trend as soon as more whales are coming in. I see that some altcoins were just getting accumulated by the whales. This means if the altcoins can recover slowly even during the bearish trend. Polygon was doing it so well and it was recovering from the dump as fast as possible compared with another token that exist in the market as well. Waiting for the massive whales will be coming back again to the crypto.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on June 25, 2022, 01:40:36 PMIs this the time that I should buy it? I think it would be a great idea knowing that people will start buying it more and more. I believe that MATIC and the team behind it, Polygon, is aiming to be one of the cryptocurrency scene's best. So I think having this type of news would be great. if that whale is buying tons of MATIC tokens, then it means, he's eyeing very good returns in the near future. because you won't risk your multi-million dollar of assets to something you don't believe in. and with MATIC, i actually think that they are one of the platforms that will survive in this bearish period and would recover fast once we are out of this period. they have working platform and more and more projects are using them. so yes, for me, they have good future. and that whale may be is looking for a good payday very soon.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: tokyohd on June 25, 2022, 11:48:20 AMAccording to the recent tweets posted by WhaleStats on-chain data service, large Ethereum whales keep purchasing big chunks of Polygon’s native coin MATIC, while the coin has added more than 26 percent in the past two days and in total has gained roughly 70 percent since the start of the week. Whales grab 15 million MATIC on 70% price surgeWhaleStats has reported that over the past 24 hours, whale known as "BlueWhale0072" has made two transactions, acquiring 10,000,000 and 4,723,190 MATIC tokens. All-in-all, these two purchases were worth $8.7 million.As covered by U.Today earlier, whales have been actively acquiring MATIC over the past six weeks since early May. By doing so they have demonstrated a 9-percent rise of their balances of wallets holding from 100 million to 1 billion tokens. Details: https://u.today/15-million-matic-bought-by-eth-whale-as-token-rises-26-in-past-3-days Interesting, might be worth noting.  They are gonna want to pump that bag hard in the next bull run.  Might have to pick up some matic just in case.  Interesting that eth whales are moving a ton of coin into what some people call eths competition.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.created_time: June 26, 2022, 03:45:24 AMLast edit: June 26, 2022, 04:49:45 AM by MAAManda
comments.body: Currently BlueWhale0072 is only holding around 178K $MATIC which is worth over $100K. After I looked it up on Blockchain, BlueWhale0072 has already moved its $MATIC Asset to another wallet (don't know if it's his wallet or not). At the address that BlueWhale0072 sent the $MATIC to, I see this wallet has accumulated more than 50 million $MATIC accumulated since 4 days ago. Is this news important? I think this is just news that is common in the crypto world.References[1] https://www.whalestats.com/transaction/ethereum/0x0612f005ca003903d7bb400dbe82d7d39ab8adf5a6f7af9feb8c5e5f57edd9e4 (WhaleStats tracking)[2] https://etherscan.io/address/0x1157a2076b9bb22a85cc2c162f20fab3898f4101 (BlueWhale0072 wallet on Etherscan)[3] https://etherscan.io/address/0x766ee93384795a08632e2cecc82a593e55bcf969 (Possible BlueWhale0072 wallet for $MATIC token accumulation)

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: MATIC is a good token and it have a lot popularity and day by day Matic chain using increasing . people loves Matic chain for low gas fee like Binance smart chain . Matic have a bright futures and it is a investable coin. I am holding 10k Matic and my target I will hold it till 2025

comments.author: BobK71
comments.body: Quote from: tokyohd on June 25, 2022, 11:48:20 AMAccording to the recent tweets posted by WhaleStats on-chain data service, large Ethereum whales keep purchasing big chunks of Polygon’s native coin MATIC, while the coin has added more than 26 percent in the past two days and in total has gained roughly 70 percent since the start of the week. Whales grab 15 million MATIC on 70% price surgeWhaleStats has reported that over the past 24 hours, whale known as "BlueWhale0072" has made two transactions, acquiring 10,000,000 and 4,723,190 MATIC tokens. All-in-all, these two purchases were worth $8.7 million.As covered by U.Today earlier, whales have been actively acquiring MATIC over the past six weeks since early May. By doing so they have demonstrated a 9-percent rise of their balances of wallets holding from 100 million to 1 billion tokens. Details: https://u.today/15-million-matic-bought-by-eth-whale-as-token-rises-26-in-past-3-days Since they started purchasing in May, it can be said that they have bought matic from the highest dip so far. We all know that after Ethereum and BNB, matic takes the position. It is now one of the potential coins. As it's price comparatively much lower, everyone has started investing heavily on metic coins.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: This is bear market period where potential tokens with great fundamentals are relatively cheap, any good investor will learn to take advantage having a long term goal in mind.No doubt matic is one of the best layer 2 scaling solution for eth network, although it is not yet 100% smooth (it does experience network hiccups sometimes) but it seems it will get better as time passes and development is persistent.Now is the time to make a sound and healthy portfolio against the coming bull season and I can see some whales are already doing that without stress.  The make has made it much fun to choose.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: Like many people, I fully agree that the MAT is really worth buying and using in this space. Along with the information surrounding it right now, I think buying it now is also a not too bad choice, and in terms of looking for sustainable and long-term profits, it is always an idea. Fit. Some information about whales moving to buy it more will also have a positive effect on the matic.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on June 25, 2022, 11:51:52 PMQuote from: crwth on June 25, 2022, 01:40:36 PMIs this the time that I should buy it? I think it would be a great idea knowing that people will start buying it more and more. I believe that MATIC and the team behind it, Polygon, is aiming to be one of the cryptocurrency scene's best. So I think having this type of news would be great. if that whale is buying tons of MATIC tokens, then it means, he's eyeing very good returns in the near future. because you won't risk your multi-million dollar of assets to something you don't believe in. and with MATIC, i actually think that they are one of the platforms that will survive in this bearish period and would recover fast once we are out of this period. they have working platform and more and more projects are using them. so yes, for me, they have good future. and that whale may be is looking for a good payday very soon.  It is going to be like a double edged sword because the amount that they are dealing with is not a joke and then if someone decided to dump all those tokens then it would be a disaster for the other MATIC holders. I just hope that it’s not going to be all done and they are going to be making it better for the future of it. They sre worth it I think.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: Some people may think this news was not even an important news but i just consider it maybe if we have already entered into the accumulation phase where the whale have been making a lot of the accumulation to the some altcoins to be used as the future trade or long term hodl. This news is not so important but for me as an active trader and the price impact that already happened with matic have been telling us if the impact was so big. Making 70% recovery during the bearish market is awesome performance.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on June 26, 2022, 03:45:24 AMI see this wallet has accumulated more than 50 million $MATIC accumulated since 4 days ago. Is this news important? I think this is just news that is common in the crypto world.If some media coverage site featured this, it could be a catalyst for fomoing. Yes people tend to do that when they found something worth risking. Matic is also one of the good L1 aside from fantom, avalanche, and solana. So it might be a good time for accumulation of these layer1 eth alternatives due to heavy downfall since then.

comments.author: Lubang Bawah
comments.body: The whale knows the time to buy the right one, he buys matic when the price is around 35 cents and if he sells now then has a profit of more than 40%, this is the habit of the Pope that is to buy when the price is, then sells gradually when it is a big profit, moreover Matic has good potential for the long term.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 26, 2022, 01:36:50 PMIf some media coverage site featured this, it could be a catalyst for fomoing. Yes people tend to do that when they found something worth risking. Matic is also one of the good L1 aside from fantom, avalanche, and solana. So it might be a good time for accumulation of these layer1 eth alternatives due to heavy downfall since then. Yes, that's most likely what happened. The leading crypto media is used as a tool to guide public opinion and thoughts regarding what will happen to the price of $MATIC in the near future. But as before, people in crypto have in-depth analysis of crypto asset prices that are going up or down, so we don't have to worry that many people will be trapped because of the news.

comments.author: Samurai trieng
comments.body: I think they bought the right coin, because matic is a coin that has enormous potential and prospects, of course this coin has a great opportunity to be higher, especially since the ETH Whale bought a very high amount of matic, I am very optimistic that the popularity of matic will increasing, for those of you who want to buy matic I think this is the right time, because the price has not gone up too high.
